_header: Here ends hawking with medicines and casting / And all that longs to good hawk keeping
_description: A couplet following a collection of prose notes on hawking derived from Juliana Berners

CamMagPep1047.Transcription:
Here endys havkyng with medsyns and CastyngAnd all that longys to
                    goode hauke kepyng

Hodgett,  G. A. J.,
                        ed.  
             Stere Htt Well: a book of medieval refinements, recipes and remedies,
                from a manuscript in Samuel Pepys’s library.
         Adelaide: Mary Martin Books, [1970?]; Cambridge, 1972.
